text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Summer! The sea!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The 'Kikuka Sho'!
Days continued with intense training runs to aim for victory in the 'Kikuka Sho'. Then one day—

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: I thank you!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: !? What's this all of a sudden, Chairman!
Yayoi Akikawa came to visit Matikanetannhauser.

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Hmm, actually, since the 'Japanese Derby', the number of applicants for the next open campus has slightly increased to 1.3 times the usual!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: The reasons are, of course, numerous! Among them, I'm certain your performance is one big reason!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: In fact, the application questionnaires showed quite a few comments saying they were encouraged by your positive attitude in the 'Japanese Derby'!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: No, no, no...! That's definitely a coincidence, me being like that!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Actually, I've been wondering... why me?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Of course, I'm happy! I'm really, really happy, but.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: If you want someone to guide the Umamusumes, there's Bourbon-san or Rice-san!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I think there are lots of more suitable, stronger options, don't you think...?

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Hmm, I see. I thought you'd realize it as you ran races!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: You are still ignorant of your own potential!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh!?
Yayoi Akikawa cleared her throat loudly and turned to face Matikanetannhauser with a serious expression.

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: I am not drawn to your race record!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Rather, you're an Umamusume who seems utterly ordinary at first glance!
But that's precisely what makes you one of a kind!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ordinariness being one of a kind...?

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Don't you remember!
How your words alone made a classmate look forward!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
...That part of you,
I really ought to learn from it, huh.

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: It was because it was you that you could push their back forward!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
First and foremost, I want you to believe that
more than anyone else!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ah, um, well, that! When you ask if I don't remember,
it's not that I don't, but...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
But, as for whether I pushed their back forward, it's iffy—
so, well, but... I see...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Maybe I can push someone's back forward, huh...
The day after something like that happened.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ever since the chairman said that to me,
I've been feeling all restless~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, is there any training that can get rid of
this restlessness~!?
choice_data_list: Then, swim around the island once and get buff!
In that case, a limit marathon for mental focus

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Got it—!
I'm off!

And so, Matikanetannhauser
jumped into the sea and in no time
was far away.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Mental focus!
I'll do my best!

And so, Matikanetannhauser
ran across the sandy beach and was far away.

It's rare for her, who's always so flat,
to get so flustered like that.

Perhaps something inside Matikanetannhauser
moved just a little,
thanks to Yayoi Akikawa's expectations.
